title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.17 - Nondiscrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.17 - Nondiscrimination

State Regulations

The commitments contained in the sponsor's affirmative
action program are not intended and shall not be used to discriminate against
any qualified applicant or apprentice on the basis of age, race, color, religion, national origin, sex, disability or marital status. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
600.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
